text: Thanat Khoman (also Thanad; ; ; May 9, 1914 - March 3, 2016) was a Thai former diplomat and politician. He was Foreign Minister from 1959 to 1971, chairman of the Democrat Party from 1979 to 1982, and Deputy Prime Minister from 1980 to 1982. ==Forming of ASEAN== He and foreign ministers of 4 other countries, were responsible for starting ASEAN.Recalling Thanat as a diplomatic doyen ==Death== Khoman died in Bangkok, Thailand of respiratory failure on March 3, 2016 at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Centenarians Category:Asian diplomats Thanat Khoman Category:World War II people
title: Thanat Khoman
